about.title: About the Giving Tree
about.confirmation:
1. Review the legend to see which tag to select
2. Click a tag or present to reveal an item
3. Confirm you are claiming that item to purchase
4. Be sure to have item shipped to HQ:
about.address:
Lori Lillard
8909 Purdue Rd
Indianapolis, IN 46268
about.dropOff:
5. Alternatively, drop the item off to Lori Lillard on the 3rd floor
6. Please donâ€™t forget the gift receipt
about.confidentiality: All shipments will be kept confidential

welcome.title: Welcome to the Giving Tree!
welcome.subtitle: Select a tag to get started or click the star to donate.

claimGift.emailSubject: Thank You From The Giving Tree

donation.title: Thank you for donating to the Giving Tree!
donation.content:
Click on the donate button below to go to the donation page
Enter your employee ID as the reference number
Enter your personal information
Within the payment section, enter the amount
Select the Giving Tree as the payment reason
Enter banking/credit card information
Continue to payment
Submit

treeEnded.title: Giving Tree has ended!
treeEnded.content: Thank you so much for your generosity. The Giving Tree is inactive at this time. Please contact Amy Arnell (amy.arnell@rjet.com) with any questions.

table.title: Gift Items
table.endTreeConfirmation: Do you want to end the Giving Tree as of {{date}}? This action cannot be undone.
table.noItems: There are no items on the tree at this time.
table.smallScreen: Please use a bigger screen to view tree items.

import.success: Gift import requested successfully. Admins will receive an email when it is complete.

editItemDrawer.title: Edit Item
editItemDrawer.name: NAME
editItemDrawer.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
editItemDrawer.unclaimWarning: Unclaiming this item will remove the purchaser.

treeActionDrawer.invalidDate: Date must be in the future.
treeActionDrawer.startTreeInformation: The Giving Tree will start as of today's date and end on {{date}}.
treeActionDrawer.editTreeInformation: The Giving Tree was started on {{startDate}} and will end on {{date}}.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page to continue
